title: Want to know font name in this logo (I searched everywhere but didnt found anything)
author: ashishbarad

comments.content:
I trust you will get a good answer if you post your request at the Font Identification forum [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317100622/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")  
Look forward to seeing you there.  
Don

Hey Ashishbarad!!  
Your provided font awesome for text logo design and I'm looking this font at [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317100622/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid") but did not found here. If you found this font name than please share your source.

Kind Regards  
Rustam  
 [Clipping Path Service](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317100622/http:/www.offshoreclippingpath.com/)
